addressList.fullAddress: Roselawn Avenue & Duplex Avenue Toronto Ontario
Roselawn Avenue & Yonge Street Toronto Ontario

backgroundInformationList.description: Removal of Permit Parking Spaces on Roselawn Avenue

noticeDescription:
Notice is hereby given that the North York Community Council proposes to have City Council to pass a by-law to remove 10 permit parking spaces on Roselawn Avenue, between Yonge Street and Duplex Avenue.  

 

Any objections regarding this proposal should be set out in writing and forwarded to the City Clerk, Attention: Matthew Green, North York Community Council, City of Toronto, Secretariat Division, City Hall, 100 Queen Street W, 10th floor west tower, Toronto, Ontario, M5H 2N2, or by E-mail: nycc@toronto.ca. Written objections received by the required date will be scheduled for deputations at the next North York Community Council meeting. If the Clerk receives no objections by the 20th day of June 2023, the City will proceed with its proposed action.
title: Notice of Proposal to Remove Permit Parking spaces on Roselawn Avenue
topics: Transportation > Intention to terminate permit parking on a road
